projects.name: XenFM Discord Bot
projects.descrip: XenFM is the best radio cum music on demand bot out there. You can just tune up some tunes by querying or tune in to 24/7 radio stations!

projects.name: Rekol
projects.descrip: Rekol an interactive whatsapp and web based assistant to help the user manage their reminders, daily tasks, grocery lists, school notes, important notes and more!

projects.name: XenFM Web Player
projects.descrip: A Standalone web player for 16+ different radio stations, built from scratch! Featuring 24/7 Music to all, with easy to use player and volume controls!

projects.name: React Portfolio
projects.descrip: My personal portfolio made entirely with ReactJS, CSS, and SASS.
